on reading compounds: 統括【トウカツ】unification, bringing together, generalization, control, supervision
統一【トウイツ】unity, consolidation, uniformity, unification, compatible
総統【ソウトウ】supreme ruler, generalissimo, president (of Taiwan), fuhrer, fuehrer
継統【ケイトウ】accession to the throne
kun reading compounds: 統べる【すべる】to rule over, to govern, to command, to control, to integrate, to consolidate, to unite, to incorporate
